email_error: The email doesn't exist in our system.
subtitle_recover: A link will be sent to your email. Follow the steps required to recover your password.
sent_link_success: A link is sent to your email. Please follow the steps required to recover your password
error_registration: Sorry, the phone number / email you entered already exists in our system. Please try again with a different phone number / email, or use the forgot password option if you already have an account with us.
not_received: We apologize for the inconvenience, but we are currently experiencing a high demand for our service and we do not have any drivers available at this moment. Please try again later or contact our customer support if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
do_cancel: Do you want to cancel your ride with
thanks: Thank you for choosing to ride with us, We look forward to see you again soon.

set_rider_message: We will inform the driver the guest details for a better pickup experience

change_password_subtitle: Please enter your current password and the new one to set then hit 'update'.

update_account: Your account has been updated successfully. Log in again for changes to take place
update_error: An error has occurred while updating your account. Please try again.
add_to_wallet: How much do you want to add to your wallet

one special character (!@#$&*?~%^)
